skills.name: Light Artillery
skills.description:
Light-weight cannon with short charging time. Basic attacks have 30% less Total DMG Multiplier.
1st Sequence: Single shot.
2nd Sequence: Empowered double shot.
3rd Sequence: Super-powered triple shot.

skills.name: Frosty Jettison
skills.description: When attacked, character releases a freezing blast that slows Attack and Move speeds of nearby enemies by 70% for 6.0s. Freezing blasts can be triggered once every 15s.
